item.description:
Trivia Night - O'Brien's - Newport RI -
"No Trivial Matter"
June 22, 2010 - 8:30 PM

Join in for - Pub Trivia Tuesdays at O'Brien's - Each and every one of us is filled with countless bits of useless knowledge - Let's put them to good use!


O’Brien’s has Pub Trivia every Tuesday, with cash prize for 1st place, and gift certificates for 2nd and 3rd place. Teams can be any size, so we can have one or more teams depending on the turnout. There's also a Bud Light promotion.

Stop in, Relax, and Enjoy! Fine Food, Good Friends, Great Fun.

Trivia is indoor/there is also an outdoor patio for after Trivia.

O'Brien's Pub is equipped with 2 large screen televisions, 5 additional TV’s, 2 pool tables, and a steel tip dart board.

Check it out: http://theobrienspub....

We are trying to schedule a regular Trivia night so if you are interested in Trivia - join the group....

If we dont get a decent # of RSVP's the meetup will be cancelled so please check calendar the night before - Thanks..
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the bar at 8:30 - or check with the hostess for the Newport Friends Group. Mark Russo - 631-433-5223
item.name: Trivia Night - O'Brien's - Newport RI - "No Trivial Matter"
